project_plan.name: CSV Data Analysis Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for numerical columns
Implement median calculation for numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for numerical columns
Build user input mechanism for selecting numerical columns
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
